website_summaries.verdict: Smaller than most E-26 models, but no less effective, these flame light bulbs fit in almost any lamp with ease and have a remarkably convincing flame effect to boot.
pros: Pair of realistic flame candles that resemble burning lanterns
Flame rotates when bulb is inverted
Provides, warm, comforting glow with a long life expectancy
cons: May need to invest in several for desired effect

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing Led Torch Flame Effect for my home!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I picked up this Beacon Lighting Led Flame Lamp E26 Torch Bulb and the way its moving flame flickers is unmatched. The universal smaller size than ones I have seen in the past allowed me to put my bulbs into my outdoor garage lights with ease ans they did not stick out the bottom. With it being only a 4 watt Led light bulb I think it should last for a long time. Thank you for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Home designer plus

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: Very unique. I think it looks better to use outdoor. So I will get an other one to put them outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable! LED Flame Technology
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my outside lanterns and the fire effect the bulb gives off is amazing. The flame flickers just like a real fire but safe since it’s LED. I highly recommend the Beacon LED Stimulation Flame Light. I will be buying more as gifts, very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jana ROG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The first 2 I ordered, one didn't work, which disappointed me. Hoogalife reached out to me through e-mail to make it right. I want to thank their customer service dept for being so responsive. They sent me out a replacement, now I have the desired look I was wanting for on my porch. These bulbs are small and not very bright, which is what I wanted for my light fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus T.

customer_reviews.title: Too bright for my liking and flicker effect is not subtle enough.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with these bulbs. I am not sure why but the color of light they put off was not flame colored at all but seemed very white to me. Also the flickering flame effect became distracting because it was more like a candle being blown on rather than a gentle flame effect. I have some solar tiki lamps with built in flame LED lights that are incredibly realistic so perhaps I expected similar results from these bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Look at all the pictures posted of this product. EVERY ONE OF THEM show the bulb as being clear and seeing the red "flame" when the light is on. TOTALLY BS!! The bulb is opaque white and is more of a strobe light than a flickering flame. This light bulb is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tortorice

customer_reviews.title: fire flame effect LED bulb
customer_reviews.text: this flame led buld was bought for our front door porch. however i tried into our indoor floor lamp, the size fit well and it looks like a real fire one , i will test how our little kid say about this new home decoration ,must be a lot of fun
customer_reviews.author: J.C

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: imagine a fluorescent bulb at your job that's flickering because it's about to die, that's what you're going to get with this product. There's no flame like visibility. Also this would fit a normal socket nothing miniature.
customer_reviews.author: NiKO

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Hope they last! Next best thing to having gas lanterns, which our hood does not have gas.
customer_reviews.author: giantdogs

customer_reviews.title: Look great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bulbs! Bought two for use in the lights on each side of garage door. Look just like a real flame, especially when standing back a little bit. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Scot

customer_reviews.title: When Fire Burns Peach
customer_reviews.text: The action of these bulbs is excellent -- very realistic flame-like movement. As expected, at only 3W the light it casts is cozy and intimate, but don't expect it to flood the room like a fireplace might. The offputting thing however is that the light itself, while in the orange spectrum, has a peach caste which makes it look artificial. It's hard to discern in the video, but at a distance (and without the auto-white balance the camera employs to correct the color), it becomes more obvious. Still these bulbs are quite cool for the price and since I tossed the boxes they came in, I don't think I can return them. The search for the perfect bulb will continue.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pseja

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple of FEIT flame bulbs from Home Depot to put in my garage coach lamps for Halloween decoration. The FEIT bulbs were huge and did not have a realistic flame appearand. These bulbs flicker and the flame jumps as if a real gas flame is being slightly blown by the wind. My coach lamps have clear glass and these still look realistic. With frosted glass, they would look even better. The small size makes a very realistic-appearing flame.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Great Virtual flame!
customer_reviews.text: Convert my light to a holiday decor. very realistic animation. My son was scared by the "flame". Going to grab more for next Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: speeder

customer_reviews.title: 5 of 16 bulbs arrived not working.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to fit in a 110 volt landscape lighting. 5 of 16 bulbs didn't work right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Love. Beautiful flame simulated
customer_reviews.text: I love these lightbulbs. The work well and beautiful in our lamps. We have bought others that were bigger in size, but they were just to big for lamps. So glad I found these smaller ones. They give off a nice soft glow that is bright enough to see, and I can use them while reading book, but aren't so bright that it would bothers my husband while he is trying to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Momma_Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Cool effect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this LED bulb for the flame effect. It really looks like real flame. Friends asked me where I bought it from because it looks really cool. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Well if you have a timer ran light switch or an alluiminated switch beware. The bulbs just flash every few seconds even when the switch is turned off on the timer switch even though a regular bulbs works fine. The allimunated switch works when turned on and they look great but when the switch is off they flash every few seconds again. Sending them back not worth the money to change out switches.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: To say that these come anywhere close to resembling flame is a stretch of the imagination. More like a random orange-yellow strobe. Nothing like the pictures in the listing. False advertising at its best! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy E Collins

customer_reviews.title: Flame effect lasts 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Look somewhere else if you want something that lasts more than a few days. Flame effect was great for the first three days, now it's just a plain light bulb. It's too bad, they were really great but they don't last and aren't worth the money. I am not only talking about 1 of the bulbs, 3 of the 4 did the exact same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical ordering these, but based on the positive reviews I decided to give them a try. Very cool lights! In the process of ordering 2 more. Have them on our deck and am impressed with the realism of the lights. Our fixtures have clear glass, I would imagine they are even more dramatic with frosted type glass, but no complaints. Warm, flickering lights with just enough brightness. Wife loves them (and that is the key) :).
customer_reviews.author: Austex Egger

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous & realistic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my lights outside my front door but turns out they required the smaller base candelabra type bulb. So I put them in canister lights on my fireplace mantle. And it looks like there is a flame burning in them and the light is beautiful. I love them! They are more realistic looking than what this video shows.
customer_reviews.author: Divine Diva

customer_reviews.title: Truly gives the impression of a real flame!
customer_reviews.text: I placed these bulbs in spot can lamps on top of my bookshelves which sit to the left and right of my entertainment unit. At night, the ambience is beautiful! Looks like soft flames flickering against the walls. I have more and I am coming up with creative ideas for them. I am thinking of creating a modern fireplace to use them in. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte T

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a decorative lantern and wanted to put some life into it by wiring it with a light socket and installing a flame bulb. I have other flame bulbs but they are bigger and would have looked out of place in the lantern. This one is perfect because it gives the effect while the bulb itself fits under the canopy of the lantern. So you see the effect more than the bulb..
customer_reviews.author: Rickster

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited about these but they look like a bulb that's losing its life, trying to stay on. Not a flame. Picture is misleading with the flames.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Replicates real fire flickering
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a lightbulb to replicate a burning flame, buy these bulbs. It’s difficult to find a standard-based bulb to fit inside a Mason jar, and these slender bulbs were exactly what I was looking for. The video just doesn’t do justice to how real the “fire-flicker” looks like, but they’re almost mesmerizing. I only gave it 2 stars for brightness, because it’s more illuminating than they are bright. So if you want the romantic or subdued lighting, these bulbs will not disappoint! I also gave these a 4 star for longevity, since this is the first time I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs last! I initially purchased these for Halloween, but I actually ended up really liking the way they look on my porch. They truly look like gas lanterns from the street. My favorite thing about these bulbs is the longevity. I burn these every night for at least 12 hours- and leave them on all day when we travel and one year later they are still working!
customer_reviews.author: Angela miller

customer_reviews.title: Finally fits my light fixture.
customer_reviews.text: These look beautiful. Finally found one that fits my light fixture. I did contact hoogalife as one of the bulbs gave up after 2 days. The bulb that gave up is just blinking like a bulb that’s dying. Wish I could upload multiple videos.
customer_reviews.author: Spangler

customer_reviews.title: do not buy if you are epileptic, doesnt flicker it flashes randomly
customer_reviews.text: This light does not "flicker" it flashes on and off in a random manner. I purchased these bulbs because of the good reviews but feel cheated. I now have two very expensive bulbs ready to put in the trash. One of my top ten worst amazon purchases.
customer_reviews.author: British Gigolo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bulbs- not as large or dramatic as expected
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs are half the size I expected- slightly larger than candelabra bulbs and not a true lightbulb-size. They do look really cool, although not as dramatic as represented in the videos. The bulbs are solid white glass so you don’t really see a “flame” as shown in the photos. I still think they’re somewhat realistic and worth the money since they look like gas lanterns from far away. For the price, I hope the bulbs last a long time. I’m a total design snob and would recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Ryskamp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome effects lighting
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of the E26 flame bulbs for the front of my house. They SMALL - only about 4 inches long, and bulb itself is about the same diameter as the bulb base, which made it easy to install in the cold. The effects are AWESOME - they look just like gas lights on the front of my house and garage. They don't give off as much light as normal 60 watt bulbs, so if you live in an area without streetlights, that could be a concern. I am THRILLED with them!
customer_reviews.author: HACCP Auditor

customer_reviews.title: Lots of unusual use possibilities...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a test for a pair of elegant, wrought iron sconces besides the doors of an old stone church now used as a residence. They are very evocative and from a distance look like torches. They can also be used, as we used them, for a lantern flame using glass beads to diffuse the light (see photo). Since I first saw animated flame bulbs, they have improved a great deal. I look forward to seeing the next generation!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Smaller size for a flame flicker bulb
customer_reviews.text: Although it uses a standard base, the overall physical size of the bulb is much smaller than a lot of the flicker bulbs on the market. I had previously purchased the larger sized bulbs and they look fine when placed in an opaque glass fixture, but in my opinion look too large when the fixture has clear glass. These bulbs however are smaller and look more like a natural flame when the lamp fixture glass is clear. The brightness of these bulbs is such that they are best used for decorative purposes rather than providing light for general illumination.
customer_reviews.author: Mequonite

customer_reviews.title: Much more active pattern than last bulb
customer_reviews.text: This is 4 watts vs 3 watts Feit I was replacing. This is noticeably brighter, which is why I was switching. The flame pattern is more active and a bigger difference between bright and dark spots. Very compact. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Leggett

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these and have gotten many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! We put them up as our front door lights (frosted glass, so you don't actually see the bulb), and have gotten multiple compliments (even from an electrician!). These flicker like candles, but are bright enough to have by our front door. Everyone thought we converted to gas lighting because the flicker is so realistic. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: T.Reid

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flame effect!
customer_reviews.text: We had a specialty lantern hanging in the window of our log home in which I tried edison type lamps. They worked great, but didn't give the desired effect. I found these online after a recommendation, and they are awesome; narrow enough to fit through the lantern globe, and have an awesome flame effect; the exact look we were going for. Can't say how long they will last, as they've just been installed a few weeks. The lamp body is just slight larger than the mogul (screw-in) base - a-lamp size, not candlelabra size.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Williams Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few of these flame lights. This is more affordable and has a better/More believable repeating loop. Only downside is they are a smidge small.
customer_reviews.author: MsgrimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Candle-Like Lighting
customer_reviews.text: The product came quickly using Prime and was delivered in a well wrapped, safe package. Once the bulbs were placed in our chandelier they made the lighting look very romantic and reflect real candle light well. Very pleased with the product and the warranty associated with the product. Customer service gets two thumbs up as well. If you are looking for a light bulb that looks like real candle light-look no further!
customer_reviews.author: AtHeNa

customer_reviews.title: Look really cool!
customer_reviews.text: They fit a "normal" lightbulb socket. Smaller than I thought but they look really cool where I am using them. Basically they light up all over inside in a random led pattern to cause the effect. The picture with the flaming lightbulb in the posting is not real (LOL). I'd give them 5 stars but they need to last more than a year and I got them last week only.
customer_reviews.author: Cawfee

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the effect of the light, they look very much like the natural gas fueled lamps that some very nice homes in our area have. I would not use them as a security light, but the light is definitely adequate to navigate steps and walkways. When I was putting the bulb in, I accidentally dropped it and figured that was the end of it, but it did not shatter and worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lyman

customer_reviews.title: They really will light up your life
customer_reviews.text: These flame bulbs are, by far, above and beyond fantastic. Not only are they beautiful when lit, they bring a "glow" to your light fixture that you cannot help but feel grateful that you chose a HOOGA LIFE LED flame bulb. I had tried several "flame light bulbs" and I can honestly say that to purchase any other bulb is a waste of money. Don't pass this opportunity by.
customer_reviews.author: LI Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Realistic Gaslight Effect
customer_reviews.text: The look of these gaslight lightbulbs is completely realistic. It has a very cool effect for the lighting on the front of my house. I would suggest using a combination of lighting types if you are using these if you need actual illumination because they don’t really throw much light. For instance, these bulbs are in the lights outside my front door and I struggle to see the lock on the door when it is dark out. I plan to solve that with some flood light landscape lighting because the ‘gaslight’ effect is too cool to go back to regular lightbulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: great product , BUY IT !
customer_reviews.text: Realistic flame effect , I like that it's only one mode , becuase it's used in a photo electric controled curcuit , and the effect dosen't change each time it turns on . Also it's compact and fits in most fixtures , The shipping was fast !
customer_reviews.author: Ivan 333

customer_reviews.title: Looks like gas light
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these lights. I was just looking for those flicker lights that sort of look like a flame. Then I realized that my porch lights were inverted so that the flicker would be upside down. Then I saw these that are LED and work the same with the base up or down. These lights look exactly like a real flame. They are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaPete

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright and Flame Like. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely would buy again. I had one from the store "as seen on TV" version. Not very bright at all. I couldnt see my keys at the front door with the flame light one. This brand however is smaller and much much brighter! I am delighted and highly recommend these. We installed one on the back porch, front porch and then ordered two more for the garage lights. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: YOU ARE BEWITCHED
customer_reviews.text: FREAKING LOVE THESE LIGHT BULBS BRO. THE WIFE HATES THEM CAUSE I PUT THEM ALL OVER THE PLACE AND NOW SHE GETS MAD BUT I TURNED THE PLACE INTO A FREAKIN HOGWARTS DORM. I DONT REGRET A THING AND LET ME TELL YOU THESE ARE WORTH THE MONEY.. STRAIGHT UP REALISTIC DIM FLAMES THATLL HAVE THE NEIGHBORS EITHER WORRIED OR JEALOUS
customer_reviews.author: Grey Olesberry

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS REAL !
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the action and look of the bulbs at night. I haven't had them long enough to comment on their longevity which directly influences their "value", but I have high hopes. If there is any negative (and it's a small one) it would be that I would wish that they were a slight bit more yellow (higher Kelvin). RFG
customer_reviews.author: gr8cook

customer_reviews.title: Does not work if you are using dimmer control switch
customer_reviews.text: The product is not dimmable..or I should say doesn't work with a dimmable wall switch if that is what is controlling your lamp. There is always a little bit of current going and the bulb flickers even when in 'off' position. I have no doubt it will be lovely in a lamp not connected to a dimmable switch or home auto system.
customer_reviews.author: Daphnesmom

customer_reviews.title: Add festive lighting for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: If I was more cleaver I would have put these flame bulbs up for Halloween (next year) but put them up for Christmas. So far, the only one on my block, we will see how many next year. Love the atmosphere it creates now that there is snow on the ground and the Christmas lights are coming up. Cannot comment on Longevity, just got them this year, they have been up for 2 weeks and so far so good
customer_reviews.author: MariaS

customer_reviews.title: Very Realistic LED Flame Bulb - Highly Recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased over 10 different brands of LED flame bulbs over the past year in search of the most realistic-looking effect and FINALLY found one that emulates a real, burning flame! Most of the other brands are either pixelated, or do not give off the right glow/color. This bulb is bright like a burning flame and has an accurate color/tone/effect that will convert any light fixture into a flame torch.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!!
customer_reviews.text: These lights look awesome. The videos don’t do it any justice. They look great from the road and you can’t tell the difference between them and gas lights. Close up I’d use a frosted or lamp shade that way you can’t tell the difference. I’m happy with the purchase. I bought some for friends. My sister every time she visits turns them on, so she can see them from the road.
customer_reviews.author: Robert O

customer_reviews.title: Neat Candle Sized Light
customer_reviews.text: This is a groovy pair of lights. They are just a touch off of what I expected. The flicker speed is just a bit too fast for my taste. I prefer a more lazy flames versus roaring flames. The color seems a bit off to me, but I've had eye issues that it could totally be me. Over all, I'm happy with my purchase. I wish I had read a bit more, as I was wanting something a bit brighter and a more lazy flicker. Anyone know if these could be adjusted? Cheers
customer_reviews.author: n8dawg

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it but the bugs hate it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just bought a house and it needed a little sprucing up. I got her some exterior fixtures, and I thought the flame bulb would be appealing at the front door. She used a regular white bulb at first and the local bugs loved it. There was a cloud of them at the front door all the time. She switched to the flame bulb, and she hasn't had any problems with bugs since, and it is sufficiently bright as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Bets taken on call to Fire Dept.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are better than I expected. I thought they might be pixelated or obviously fake, which would have been fine since we put them out for Halloween. They are much brighter and more realistic than a joke/novelty light. Can’t speak to longevity since we just put them out a couple nights ago. We were joking about whether or not someone would call the fire department. It’s a distinct possibility!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Light bulb Review: These awesome bulbs fit just about anywhere a normal LED light bulb fits, but they don’t simply cast light. Instead, they’re designed to look like real flickering flames — and they really do! These bulbs are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings.
customer_reviews.text: Had mixed feelings. Love the flickering but it's not very bright, neither is real flame. It has more of orange glow than yellow-orange. Since our front entrance only has one lamp, so not bright enough with just one. Also, when looking at it from the street, it now looks kinda cheesy when we have solar landscape lights and bright garage lights nearby. We'll opt to use this bulb for Halloween to Christmas instead.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Curnutte

customer_reviews.title: You want realism? This is it! Trust me!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, this is the BEST FLAME LED I've EVER HAD! Wow! Words can not describe how awesome these lights are! I am trying to save up for another set right now! These light are the most realistic looking flame out of all the ones (and I've bought A LOT OF THESE TYPES OF LIGHTS!) I've ever had the pleasure of owning! Amazing quality! It's almost as if someone trapped fire within the bulb and made it look fake! Not kidding! BUY THESE NOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Erdman

customer_reviews.title: Like an old timey street lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Only time will tell about the longevity, but these light bulbs are so cool!! They are very bright, which surprised me! I thought it would be a soft flicker, but these function perfectly as porch and garage lights - nice and bright! It is also crazy how much these look like real flames, so cool!
customer_reviews.author: OHMomof2

customer_reviews.title: Great Ambiance
customer_reviews.text: Had two torchiere lamps with open top frosted shades and used these LED bulbs. They give a flickering flame look that is fairly realistic. They don't throw a great deal of light but that isn't why I wanted them. This product did exactly what I wanted and wasn't disappointed. Already had people comment. Haven't had them long enough to comment on longevity. So far happy with the value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: mydoghasfleas

customer_reviews.title: Not the color or quality expected but customer service is good!
customer_reviews.text: 5 star for customer service. I was very disappointed in this bulb. Pink in color and nothing like the natural fire flame as advertised. Returned, and was promptly refunded.. 5 stars to the seller for customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Morning Glory

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with outside timer. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! The bulbs worked well enough in a regular indoor table lamp -- good brightness, decent color, okay "flame" effect -- but in my outdoor light fixtures, which are on a timer, they were a total bust: no flames, just a rhythmic pulsing orange strobe light. I only learned of the "no timers" shortcoming by digging into the questions and comments after my purchase. On the plus side, the return was very easy, so positive marks for good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Keith W.

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else!
customer_reviews.text: 3 of the 4 bulbs were dead on arrival. The one bulb that worked was pinkish in color (not orange or yellow) and did not resemble a flame in any way. Extremely poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect soft gas lamp glow for Christmas! Looks like the REAL thing!
customer_reviews.text: I can't yet speak for the longevity of these bulbs since I've only just put them in my outdoor lamps, but the glow they give at Christmas time is perfect! Looks just like a soft natural gas lamp! Better than the bulbs we tried last year from another manufacturer that gave more of an orange arificial flame. I was worried at first these would be too small but they fit perfectly in my standard outdoor light fixtures. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: mom2one

customer_reviews.title: Look like fire
customer_reviews.text: These little lights fit in smaller light fixtures . I was really surprised at the color temp . They look pretty real from 15 to 20 feet away . I hope they last .
customer_reviews.author: JEFFERY  MCGHAN

customer_reviews.title: Best looking light!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned various flickering lights over the past few years, but this one is the most realistic! It looks like a gaslight even without frosted glass! They are absolutely worth the money if you are looking for a realistic-looking flickering light!
customer_reviews.author: Peeps21

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and brightness
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bulbs for two carriage lights on my garage. After researching other flickering bulbs I chose these mostly for their size and upside down feature. I am glad I did. These are perfect. Not too big and not too bright. I really didn't want to light up the area but I just wanted the effect. Not too sure how long they will last but if I get two years I will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Suited for housings that hide the bulb.
customer_reviews.text: From a distance it does look like flickering flame. As long as the bulb itself is not visible. I have not tried these in anything where you have a direct line of sight with the bulb. I can’t imagine anyone would mistake the action on the bulb for flame though.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great and look like a real flame. Very comforting without the soot!! It isnt strong enough to show up enough to offer real usable lighting in my outdoor lamps, but I use it inside and can use it outside for pure ambience. I love these bulbs!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: LED Flickering Lights. Very pleased with quality and affect
customer_reviews.text: The lights have the soft flickering effect that I was looking for. All of my bulbs are situated upright, but I think these bulbs can be hung upside down and still have the correct orientation of the flicker. They seem solid and sturdy. I’ve had a set in my garage carriage lights for several months (8?) with no issues. This is my second order of lights because I replaced my lamp post and the socket is different. All of my current lights have a ‘standard’ light bulb socket. However, I did have a set of the candelabra flickering lights in my old lamp post. They worked very well also.
customer_reviews.author: FSC1968

customer_reviews.title: Brightness
customer_reviews.text: These are the best lights of this type light bulb that I have used so far. Not too bright to destroy the look. I've purchased a dozen other bulbs like these that are just to bright, they are supposed to look like a flame, not a flame flower. This was my second order of these bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Hildman

customer_reviews.title: Like it - great colors, maybe not flame like
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly as offered. The area with the colors projection was larger than I expected. Doesn’t resemble a flame, but the colors of a flame yes. Think it will be perfect, planning to use them for the holidays. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Wyre Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great light, best in its class
customer_reviews.text: This a great light in a really small form factor. Despite its small size it is actually brighter and more realistic than the other brands I’ve purchased. This is a great ambience light for patios and porches, and really superb for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wirth

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely  beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell you how much we absolutely love the flame appearance of these LED lightbulbs! We have had so many comments regarding the gas lantern look that we were attempting to achieve through the lightbulbs. They absolutely performed exactly as we had hoped.....we put up a total of 12 lights as the warm glow that complements our timber frame structure was exactly what we were shooting for. Thank you for such an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: CFree

customer_reviews.title: Too Bright But Can Remedy That
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed because these are actually brighter than I expected, and the flame not quite yellow enough for realism for me. However, I used masking tape and wrapped around the bulb twice and the color is now much more realistic for a flame.
customer_reviews.author: jmt64

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights, just wish they were brighter
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome lights. We got new lamps for outside of our garage, and the glass on the lamos are frosted. With these bulbs, it actually looks like there is an actual flame. The only issue I have is that they're not bright enough, but the ambiance is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Half

customer_reviews.title: Halloween 🎃 light?
customer_reviews.text: I just placed it in my outside pole lamp. It replaced a orange red $1.00 - 4watt 💡. It’s much brighter, however it seems to project a whiter color then expected! It says it’s 4 watts, but doesn’t state what it projects?
customer_reviews.author: Blzr

customer_reviews.title: out of 4 new bulbs only 1 worked. total crap product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and only 1 worked. They sent me two more for free but neither one worked! These things are total crap!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Herman

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fireplace. The bulb arrived on time. While the color is not as vibrant as it shows on the product page, it is adequate for what I need it to do. Brightness is also quite good. It is a little expensive, but on par with similar bulb of other brands.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lui

customer_reviews.title: Buy These! THEY FIT. Very Real Look.
customer_reviews.text: The larger standard size bulbs are too long to fit it to the halo which holds the glass on our house front lights. These slimmer ones are shorter and work perfect. Plus they are brighter and look realistic. Also, the “flames” display the full length of the bulb. Tried four different brands to compare. Though these are the shortest they are by far brighter and more fire like in color, movement and brightness than any of the others.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Nice bulbs to simulate flames
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to simulate a gas flame on the outdoor light fixtures on either side of my front entry door. While the flames look very realistic, I wish they were a little brighter. Overall I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jacks

customer_reviews.title: We love them
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were surprised at how much this looks like a flame. We put these in some small lamps that are surrounded by frosted glass which helps the illusion even more. We flip two of them on during movie night and it looks pretty cool. Thinking of getting some for the back patio. I definitely would purchase these again
customer_reviews.author: High Fi

customer_reviews.title: these are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought these the other day and they came in quickly...I put them on the front of my house and they look AWESOME!!! The only thing I am skeptical about is how long they will last.....we will see. I will modify this if they dont last long.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Too pink
customer_reviews.text: The flame is too pink when compared to others. Not enough orange and yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun and functional
customer_reviews.text: More orange than red flame but they are still really nice. Not sure on long-term use but a few months so far so good, they are on all night. It gives off a very warm glow to your yard or space without attracting bugs. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Luminated light switch causing them to flick when turned off
customer_reviews.text: The lights flick every few seconds when they are turned off. Googled it. Seems to be caused by the luminated light switch they are on. Hmmm. Not sure I want to replace light switch to fix this issue. May return bulbs. Still thinking about it. UPDATE. I decided to install a new wall switch that is not illuminated. That solved the problem of the flame bulbs flickering. So keeping the bulbs. They are pretty cool. Changed rating from 2 to 4 stars. I did let seller know of this problem. They said they would look into it
customer_reviews.author: melissa wetzig

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally charming outdoor lighting!
customer_reviews.text: The missus and I really like these! We bought these for outdoor Halloween decoration but we'll probably keep them as permanent fixtures for our house! I cannot speak upon longevity because we've only had them for a few days but hopefully they burn bright for a while to come!
customer_reviews.author: David Adams

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic
customer_reviews.text: We put these in two outdoor lanterns and the effect is very cool. They look and behave just like a gas flame. The only slight cons are that if you're closer than 6 feet, you can see the bulb and can tell it's not gas (although the flame effect is just as impressive). And it's pretty orange. I'd like a bit more yellowish light mixed in, but that's just nitpicking. Could use a few slight improvements, but very impressive and we love them. Haven't seen anything better on the market as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: It's not a reading lamp or security light
customer_reviews.text: Love the function, works up or down. Just bought it, being an l.e.d. I hope for a long life. If it does something with motion detection I would be amazed, I got out of bed the other night in my boxers and went out on the front porch to check the brightness, it's very dim and luckily no sensor increased the brightness, so shrouded in darkness I went back to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Look Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These look so much better than others on the market. We had one of our neighbors stop and ask where we purchased them because they looks so real on our from porch light. He purchased some to replace the ones he had in his lights.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Kent Street

customer_reviews.title: looks neat, but its a novelty.  You need other lights if you want to see something
customer_reviews.text: Not enough light given off. these would be great if in a location you only ever want ambiance, but they are no good at all for lighting up an area. The reason i gave 3 stars is because it looks neat and has its place. But they are insanely overpriced for 2 bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: master Irrigator

customer_reviews.title: Looks so much like real flames!
customer_reviews.text: Great item. I loved them so much. I bought some for both of my son's New Houses. Funny part is. One son put one on each side of his garage. Brand New house and the second night. One of his neighbors thought the house was on fire. They look so life like. They called the Fire Department! Honest to gods truth!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael William Ruzicka

customer_reviews.title: These are great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and they really do look like fire, installed one in the hallway and the wife nearly called 911 lol. Ended up using them on our rear deck porch lights and they really add ambiance to our campfire nights!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Roberts

customer_reviews.title: The flame is convincing; what else is there to know?
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. I don't want to attach a video or picture because they don't look nearly as good as in real life. I was worried it would just be a glow and not really a good flame effect. The flame is very convincing; exactly what I was hoping for. I've only had it for a few hours so idk about longevity but so far it's perfect. I have two exterior lights on either side of my garage and it's great; looks like a lantern on each side of my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Ian K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Bright and realistic.
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic color and flicker through a frosted glass cover. Surprisingly bright at night, and even somewhat visible in midday direct sunlight. Very good for only 4 watts. The small dimensions allow the bulb it fit in fixtures that most competing products won’t.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Nice flames
customer_reviews.text: So these are better because they actually look like flames! We tried another brand and wow, terrible blobs similar to a lava lamp = no good. We tried these because they seemed like a U.S. design. Good on the front porch at night!
customer_reviews.author: I'm a real customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright but looks so real from the street!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a four pack to install in three porch / driveway lights. They appear very realistic and add great ambiance to the Christmas season.
customer_reviews.author: AlanB

customer_reviews.title: Reminiscent of old time gas lamps.
customer_reviews.text: We used the bulb in our coach lamp in our front yard. It looks exactly like a gas flame. It's so convincing our neighbors across from us called to tell us our coach lamp was on fire. I purchased the two pack in order to have a replacement bulb for the coach light.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great fire-like effects
customer_reviews.text: I saw these in a restaurant one night and thought they would look great in two evening lights we have at home. They didn't disappoint, we love them! Set them out on the deck one evening when you have guests over, they look fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Steven C Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good flame effect, but not like crisp flame in pics.
customer_reviews.text: I put these in fixtures on either side of garage door for Halloween. Nice effect. I took off a star because the flame effect does not look like the high-def flame in the picture. It's a good effect, but a blurry look...not a crisp flame as shown in photos.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Compact size fits in smaller light fixtures
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the compact size of this LED bulb. It fits in smaller light fixtures unlike some of the larger first generation flame effect bulbs. The flame effect is excellent and creates a very convincing illusion of a flickering flame.
customer_reviews.author: Kotor29

customer_reviews.title: Looks more like a flickering light instead of flames
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't resemble a flame, looks more like circles of light moving up and down so just kind of flickers. Still cute so ill keep them. Not sure how long they will last because I've only had them a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LED Flame Effect Light Bulbs - E26 LED Bulb with Gravity Sensor Flame Night Bulb for Holiday Gifts Home Hotel Bar Party Decoration(2 Pack)
feature_bullets: 🔥Firelike LED flame🔥 – Beacon Led flame bulb lets you have the cozy and inviting visual warmth, The firelike color, clarity, and flickering motion of the Beacon Lighting bulb provides an amazing ambiance without the hazard and smoke of the fire.

🔥Easy to use🔥 - Fire bulb screws into any standard electric light bulb socket. In the time it takes to change a light bulb, you can convert your Outdoor Lamp Post, Garage Lights, indoor floor lamp, ceiling light, or any other light fixture into a simulated flame.
🔥Innovative Design🔥 - Made with patented technology, 75 LEDs flash to mimic replicate the look of an actual flame. Plus, using only 4 watts of highly efficient energy.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,090 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
